hero.label: Help Center
hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find answers to common questions about our car rental services. If you can't find what you're looking for, our support team is here to help.

questions.how-to-book: How do I book a car?
questions.modify-cancel: Can I modify or cancel my reservation?
questions.account-required: Do I need to create an account to rent a car?
questions.advance-booking: How far in advance should I book a car?

answers.how-to-book: You can book a car directly through our website by selecting your pickup and return dates, choosing a vehicle, and completing the booking form. Our booking process is simple and secure, with instant confirmation sent to your email.
answers.modify-cancel:
‚Ä¢ **Modifications**: Change dates, vehicle, or pickup location through your account
‚Ä¢ **Cancellation Policy**: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before pickup
‚Ä¢ **Availability**: Changes subject to vehicle availability
‚Ä¢ **Refunds**: Processed within 3-5 business days
answers.account-required: You can browse our vehicles and prices without creating an account, but having an account makes it easier to manage reservations, view your rental history, and speed up future bookings. Account creation is quick and free.
answers.advance-booking:
‚Ä¢ **Recommended**: Book 3-5 days in advance for best selection
‚Ä¢ **Peak Seasons**: Reserve 1-2 weeks ahead during holidays
‚Ä¢ **Last-Minute**: Limited availability but possible with additional fees
‚Ä¢ **Flexible Options**: Same-day bookings available for urgent needs

questions.documents: What documents do I need to rent a car?
questions.additional-driver: Can I add an additional driver?

answers.documents: You'll need a valid driver's license, a government-issued ID (like a passport), and a credit or debit card in the driver's name. International drivers should also have an international driving permit.
answers.age-requirement:
‚Ä¢ **Minimum Age**: 21 years old for most vehicles
‚Ä¢ **Young Driver Fee**: Additional charge for drivers under 25
‚Ä¢ **Luxury Vehicles**: 25+ years for premium cars
‚Ä¢ **Senior Drivers**: No maximum age limit
answers.insurance:
‚Ä¢ **Basic Coverage**: Included in all rentals
‚Ä¢ **Collision Damage**: Optional upgrade available
‚Ä¢ **Personal Effects**: Additional coverage for belongings
‚Ä¢ **Roadside Assistance**: 24/7 emergency support
answers.additional-driver:
‚Ä¢ **Registration**: Add drivers during booking or at pickup
‚Ä¢ **Requirements**: Valid license and age verification
‚Ä¢ **Fees**: Additional charge per extra driver
‚Ä¢ **Responsibilities**: All drivers share liability

questions.payment-methods: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.additional-fees: Are there additional fees I should know about?

answers.payment-methods:
‚Ä¢ **Credit Cards**: Visa, MasterCard, American Express
‚Ä¢ **Debit Cards**: Accepted with sufficient funds
‚Ä¢ **Cash Payments**: Available at select locations
‚Ä¢ **Bank Transfer**: For corporate accounts
answers.deposit:
‚Ä¢ **Security Deposit**: Required at pickup
‚Ä¢ **Amount**: Varies by vehicle type (‚Ç¨200-‚Ç¨1000)
‚Ä¢ **Refund**: Returned after vehicle inspection
‚Ä¢ **Hold Period**: 3-5 business days for processing
answers.additional-fees:
‚Ä¢ **Late Return**: ‚Ç¨25 per hour after grace period
‚Ä¢ **Extra Mileage**: ‚Ç¨0.25 per kilometer over limit
‚Ä¢ **Fuel**: Refueling service fee if needed
‚Ä¢ **Cleaning**: ‚Ç¨50 for excessive dirt/damage
answers.discounts:
‚Ä¢ **Early Booking**: 10% off for 7+ days advance
‚Ä¢ **Long-term**: 15% off for 7+ day rentals
‚Ä¢ **Loyalty Program**: Exclusive rates for repeat customers
‚Ä¢ **Corporate**: Special rates for business accounts

questions.pickup-location: Where can I pick up my rental car?
questions.different-return: Can I return the car to a different location?
questions.late-return: What happens if I return the car late?
questions.refuel: Do I need to refuel the car before returning it?

answers.pickup-location:
‚Ä¢ **Main Office**: Central Chisinau location
‚Ä¢ **Airport**: Chisinau International Airport
‚Ä¢ **Partner Stations**: Select hotels and stations
‚Ä¢ **Delivery Service**: Available for premium rentals
answers.different-return:
‚Ä¢ **One-way Rentals**: Available between major cities
‚Ä¢ **Additional Fee**: ‚Ç¨50-‚Ç¨200 depending on distance
‚Ä¢ **Advance Notice**: Book 48 hours in advance
‚Ä¢ **Restrictions**: Some locations may not allow returns
answers.late-return:
‚Ä¢ **Grace Period**: 30 minutes free
‚Ä¢ **Late Fees**: ‚Ç¨25 per hour after grace period
‚Ä¢ **Communication**: Contact us if you'll be late
‚Ä¢ **Flexibility**: We try to accommodate delays when possible
answers.refuel:
‚Ä¢ **Same Level**: Return with same fuel as pickup
‚Ä¢ **Refueling Service**: ‚Ç¨50 + fuel cost if needed
‚Ä¢ **Nearby Stations**: Maps provided for convenience
‚Ä¢ **Receipt**: Keep fuel receipts for verification

intro.title: Introduction and your agreement
intro.description: If you continue to use our website, you agree to the terms of use. We respect the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), and GDPR requirements have become an integral part of these terms of use. When you use our website, we collect and store your personal information. These terms of use explain how we collect and use your personal data. If you have questions or need clarification regarding the use of your personal data, please contact us through the contact form.

cookies.title: Cookie Files
cookies.bullet1: Cookies are stored in your browser to personalize your experience using the website
cookies.bullet2: By accepting the Cookie Policy, you agree to the use of cookies
cookies.bullet3: We use cookies to improve the quality of the experience on our website
cookies.bullet4: Cookies help us receive reports on errors that occur when using our website

personal-data.title: Personal data
personal-data.bullet1: We collect personal information: name, email, phone number and IP address
personal-data.bullet2: We collect data only when you make a purchase on the site
personal-data.bullet3: Information is used for identification, confirmation and customer communication
personal-data.bullet4: We do not transmit this information to third parties - data is stored securely

location.title: Your location
location.bullet1: We use your IP address to determine your location
location.bullet2: Location information helps us personalize your experience
location.bullet3: Your location helps us display relevant ads near you
location.bullet4: We use your location to broadcast targeted and relevant ads

payment.title: Your credit card information
payment.bullet1: When making a purchase, you enter your credit card details or PayPal address
payment.bullet2: The entire payment process is handled by specialized payment systems
payment.bullet3: We do not store your credit card details
payment.bullet4: We do not have access to payment information at any stage of the purchase process

notifications.title: System notifications
notifications.bullet1: By using our website, you agree to receive notifications at your email address
notifications.bullet2: Notifications may include booking information, confirmations and updates
notifications.bullet3: Notifications serve as reminders and useful tips for using the site
notifications.bullet4: The only way to stop receiving notifications is to delete your account

story.label: Our Story
story.title: From Humble Beginnings to Industry Leaders

2023.title: Launch
2023.description: We started with 3 cars and a vision: to make car rentals accessible in Moldova.

2023-2024.title: First Year
2023-2024.description: We reached 15 cars and 200+ loyal customers. Simpler processes, transparent prices.

today.title: Today
today.description: 25+ cars, online bookings, home delivery. We continue to grow step by step.

story.paragraph1: Founded in 2009, Level Auto Rental began as a small family business with a simple mission: to provide reliable, affordable transportation solutions for everyone. What started with just five vehicles has grown into one of Moldova's most trusted car rental services.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we've expanded our fleet to include over 500 vehicles ranging from economy cars to luxury sedans and SUVs. Our commitment to customer satisfaction and quality service has remained unchanged, earning us the loyalty of thousands of customers and numerous industry awards.
story.paragraph3: Today, we continue to innovate and improve our services, embracing new technologies and sustainable practices to better serve our customers and protect the environment for future generations.

values.label: Our Values
values.title: The principles that guide everything we do

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: All our vehicles undergo rigorous safety inspections and maintenance to ensure your peace of mind on the road.

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: We prioritize customer satisfaction with 24/7 support and personalized service tailored to your needs.

quality.title: Quality Service
quality.description: Our commitment to excellence has earned us industry recognition and the trust of thousands of customers.

team.label: Meet Our Team
team.title: The dedicated professionals behind our success

hero.label: Contact Us
hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.description: Have questions about our car rental services? We're here to help you with any inquiries or support you need.

contact.contact-description: Reach out to us through any of these channels. We're available to assist you with your car rental needs.
contact.form-description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

hero.label: Customer Reviews
hero.title: What Our Customers Say
hero.description: Read authentic reviews from our satisfied customers and discover why they choose LevelAutoRental for their car rental needs.

reviews.sectionDescription: Discover what our customers say about their experience with LevelAutoRental

cta.title: Ready to Experience Excellence?
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust LevelAutoRental for their car rental needs.

home-page.1: Amazing service! The car was clean, reliable, and the booking process was incredibly simple. I will definitely use it again!
home-page.2: The best car rental experience I've ever had. Great prices, excellent customer service, and the car exceeded my expectations.
home-page.3: Very professional service. Pickup was fast and the car was exactly as described. Highly recommended!
home-page.4: Fantastic experience from start to finish. The website is easy to use and the car was perfect for our family trip.
home-page.5: Excellent service! The car was in perfect condition, and the booking process was very simple. Reasonable prices, highly recommended!
home-page.6: Very satisfied with the service! The car matched the description, and the staff was professional. Will definitely use again.

comments.1: I've had experience with several rental services, and this is probably one of the fastest and most reliable. Well-maintained cars, transparent and well-detailed contract, no special conditions or extra payment for cross-border trips, loyal. If I had to recommend a rental fleet, this would definitely be it.
comments.2: Everything great üî• service at the level, nice cars, staff rated 10. üôåüòç
comments.3: The guys really provide quality service, the best car wash in Chi»ôinƒÉu, a wide range of services, they use quality chemicals and respect the cleaning process, you always leave in a good mood in a truly clean car.
comments.5: Excellent service, wide range of cars, possibility to extend the rental contract remotely! Great guys. ‚úä
comments.6: I found the rental car I was looking for.
comments.7: Excellent service. Many cars. The rental process is very fast. They offer cars to foreigners too. Recommend!
comments.8: They also have cars for sale. We wanted to see one. First, they didn't answer. The second time they answered. They said they would call back. They didn't call back. It turned out that the listing was not updated.
comments.10: Very good service! The car was clean and in perfect condition. The booking process was simple and fast. I will definitely use these services again.
comments.11: Best car rental experience! Excellent prices, great customer service, and the car exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend!
comments.12: Superior quality car wash service! The car came out like new. The staff is very detail-oriented and uses quality products. I will definitely return!
comments.13: Fantastic experience! I rented a Mercedes and everything was perfect. The team is professional, I was served immediately and the process was very simple. The car was in impeccable condition!
comments.14: I recommend with complete confidence! Fast service, new cars and fair prices. I've used the services twice already and each time I was very satisfied.
comments.15: Excellent service for car rentals in Chi»ôinƒÉu. They also offer home delivery, which is very convenient. The cars are well-maintained and the prices are better than the competition.
comments.16: I rented for the weekend and was very impressed by the quality of service. Very friendly staff and responds promptly to questions. The car was clean and in perfect working condition.
comments.17: Professional and trustworthy service. The contract is clear, no surprises. I've rented multiple times and each time everything went perfectly. Recommend!
comments.18: Best car rental company in Moldova! Fair prices, quality cars and super helpful team. Will definitely use again!
comments.19: Fast service, good cars, fair prices. What more can you ask for? Highly recommend for anyone needing a rental car in Chisinau.
comments.20: I was very satisfied with the service offered. Competitive prices, good cars and friendly staff. I will definitely return for the next rental!

carsPage.title: Rent Your Ideal Car
carsPage.subtitle: Varied fleet of premium vehicles ‚Ä¢ Complete services with or without driver ‚Ä¢ Permanent assistance and clear prices

calculator.pricesDescription: For an exact and personalized offer, please contact us directly.

contract.description: Our company provides car rental services on the territory of the Republic of Moldova, strictly respecting the current legislation. Customer interaction is based on the Rental Contract, which guarantees the legal protection of their interests.
contract.requirementsDescription: To rent a car, the following requirements must be met:

details.fullPayment: Full payment (100%) of the rental fee for the selected car.
details.finesResponsibility: All fines received during vehicle use are the driver's responsibility.
details.cascoResponsibility: In the absence of CASCO insurance, accident liability falls to the driver.
details.paymentMethods: Payment can be made in cash, by bank transfer or by card.
details.earlyReturn: The client has the right to cost recalculation in case of early vehicle return.
details.extension: Extension of the rental contract is possible remotely, but is not guaranteed.
details.delivery: Delivery or return of the car to a convenient address is possible. Cost is confirmed by phone +373 62 000 112.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.description: Deposit payment according to the value established in the Contract. The deposit represents insurance of the Tenant's obligations fulfillment and is returned after 10 days from the car handover, in the absence of major violations.

mileageLimit.title: Mileage limit
mileageLimit.description: In case of rental for several days, the limit is calculated in total. In case of exceeding the limit and in the absence of the activated 'Unlimited mileage' option, the excess is paid separately.

secondDriver.title: Second driver
secondDriver.description: Before signing the Rental Contract, the cost of adding a second driver is 0 lei. After signing the Rental Contract, the cost of adding a second driver is 500 lei.

depositReturn.title: Deposit return
depositReturn.description: If the deposit is left in cash, it is returned upon car handover. If retained from the card, return takes place within 10 working days after car handover.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

overview.title: Control Panel
overview.noFavoriteCar: You haven't borrowed any car, so you don't have a favorite car yet.
